summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6071 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Craven's Division of Greenlake Addition, being the Alley between North 68th Street and North 70th Street from Fremont Avenue to Linden Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83313, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
